May 18
England women Test legend Enid Bakewell is still absolutely killing it on the cricket field at age 80.
For anyone who made it here, have some bonus Enid action (dispatching a full toss) beca… [+1398 chars]

articles.title: India Head Coach Ravi Shastri Pays Tribute to Rajendrasinh Jadeja - News18
articles.description: Rajendrasinh Jadeja played 50 first-class and 11 List A matches, picking 134 and 14 wickets respectively.
articles.content: Team India head coach Ravi Shastri on Sunday paid rich tributes to the former Saurashtra cricketer and the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) referee Rajendrasinh Jadeja, expressing his sad… [+2009 chars]
